sentences.sContent: Polysaccharides: starch dextrin cellulose and glycogen all of which are made of chains of glucose.
sentences.sContent_eng: Polysaccharides: starch dextrin cellulose and glycogen all of which are made of chains of glucose.
sentences.sCn: 多糖：淀粉、糊精、纤维素和糖原，而这一切都是由糖链。

sentences.sContent: Methods Immunofluorescence, glycogen test, gold labeling immunoassay and polymerase chain reaction (PCR)were used to detect specimen of cervical secretion from 100 women.
sentences.sContent_eng: Methods Immunofluorescence, glycogen test, gold labeling immunoassay and polymerase chain reaction (PCR)were used to detect specimen of cervical secretion from 100 women.
sentences.sCn: 方法免疫荧光法，糖原试验，胶体金标记技术免疫检测，聚合酶链反应（PCR）分别对100例妇产科就诊患者宫颈分泌物标本进行平行检测。

sentences.sContent: As he explains, when you consume carbohydrates they are stored in two forms, as either 'muscle glycogen' or as 'liver glycogen'.
sentences.sContent_eng: As he explains, when you consume carbohydrates they are stored in two forms, as either 'muscle glycogen' or as 'liver glycogen'.
sentences.sCn: 他解释说，当你消耗碳水化合物时，它们的储存形式有两种，一种是“肌糖原”，另一种是“肝糖原”。 。

trans.tranOther: a polysaccharide consisting of glucose units: the form in which carbohydrate is stored in the liver and muscles in man and animals
